Submodules¶

models.nmf module¶

class models.nmf.Nmf(k)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base abstract NMF class. All Joint NMF and Single NMF classes inherit from this class.

static classify_by_max(x: <built-in function array>, axis)[source]¶

Classifies the input array based on max filter along the specified axis

Args:
x (np.array): Input array axis (int): Axis along which to perform the classification
Returns:
np.array: Classified array in one-hot format
classmethod cluster_matrix(x: <built-in function array>, axis)[source]¶

Clusters the provided matrix along the given axis

Args:
x (np.array): Input matrix axis (int): Axis along which to perform the clustering
Returns:
np.array: Output matrix
classmethod connectivity_matrix(x: <built-in function array>, axis)[source]¶

Calculates the connecitivity matrix along the given axis.

The function first classifies the input matrix along the specified axis and then matrix multiplies it to itself keeping the rank side common.

Args:
x (np.array): the input matrix. axis {int}: axis along which the connectivity matrix should be classified. For W matrix, it’s 1 and for the H matrix it is 0.
Returns:
np.array: the output matrix.
static cophenetic_correlation(consensus_matrix)[source]¶

Calculates the cophentic correlation co-efficient from a consensus matrix.

Arguments:
consensus_matrix (np.array): the unordered consensus matrix
Returns:
int: the cophenetic correlation co-efficient
static reorder_consensus_matrix(M: <built-in function array>)[source]¶

Reoders the consensus matrix.

Args:
M (np.array): Input matrix
Returns:
np.array: Reordered output matrix
wrapper_update(iter, verbose=0)[source]¶

Updates the weights for the number of iterations specified.

Args:
iter (int): Number of iterations through which the model should update. verbose (int, optional): Defaults to 0. To increase verbsosity.
